name: SecTrustOptionFlags
desc: The option flags used to condition a trust evaluation.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Initializes a trust option flags structure.

items.name: static var allowExpired: SecTrustOptionFlags
items.desc: Allow expired certificates (except for the root certificate).

items.name: static var leafIsCA: SecTrustOptionFlags
items.desc: Allow CA certificates as leaf certificates.

items.name: static var fetchIssuerFromNet: SecTrustOptionFlags
items.desc: Allow network downloads of CA certificates.

items.name: static var requireRevPerCert: SecTrustOptionFlags
items.desc: Require a positive revocation check for each certificate.

items.name: static var implicitAnchors: SecTrustOptionFlags
items.desc: Treat properly self-signed certificates as anchors implicitly.
